events.message: The candidate submitted their application expressing strong interest for the software engineer position at our company.
After reviewing the resume, the application was categorized under the engineering department focusing on development roles.
A recruiter specializing in engineering hires was assigned to manage the candidate's recruitment process.
The initial screening call went well; the candidate demonstrated good knowledge in relevant software development frameworks.
Candidate responded promptly to the screening questions and expressed excitement about the upcoming technical interview.
Technical interview was scheduled with the senior engineering team for next Wednesday to evaluate coding skills.
Candidate completed the technical interview successfully, showing strong problem-solving abilities and coding proficiency.
HR interview was scheduled to discuss company culture and role expectations with the candidate.
Candidate had an engaging HR interview and expressed alignment with the company's values and mission.
An official offer was proposed to the candidate including salary details, benefits, and start date.
Candidate responded with positive feedback, expressing strong interest and requesting clarification on some benefits.
Candidate accepted the offer enthusiastically and confirmed availability to start onboarding next month.
Candidate began onboarding process, completing paperwork and attending orientation sessions successfully.
The hiring process was officially closed after the candidate completed onboarding and joined the engineering team.
